name: Spaceflight simulator (itch) (demoeater)
description:
spaceflight simulator is a sandbox and a simulation game where you build and manage your own space program. You can make different types of rocket ships, explore new planets, recreate apollo mission and do much more

                disclaimer

this game is not a free game and it is on steam, and the only reason you are able to download the game for free right here is because this is bought with real money and this is a copy of the real game. And no I did not make this game feel free to download the game below and enjoy.
